review: This movie felt like an attempt towards making an Indian version of Step Up movies. After seeing the lead actors/dancers and a lot of supporting actors/dancers performing in DID and knowing what they are capable of, all the extra flashes and light effects seemed more distracting, than embellishing the dance acts. This movie felt like an attempt towards making an Indian version of Step Up movies. After seeing the lead actors/dancers and a lot of supporting actors/dancers performing in DID and knowing what they are capable of, all the extra flashes and light effects seemed more distracting, than embellishing the dance acts. Since it is Indian version of the Step Up movies, it would have been interesting to see the lead female dancer doing a fusion of Indian classical dances, rather than the ballet. It is a very good attempt, though!
